message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $1,000,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to pay $600,000 for the product. It's a fair offer considering its value on the market.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $600,000 is simply not enough for me.  I'm willing to come down to $850,000, which still leaves room for both of us to benefit from this deal.  Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, I understand your position, but I'm on a tight budget. I can go up to $700,000. This is my final offer.

Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but $700,000 simply won't work for me. This product is worth significantly more than that. I'm willing to make one final concession and offer it to you for $800,000.  This is my absolute bottom line. If you're not able to meet this price, I'll have to explore other options.
